title: git-rename-folder
content:
How to rename a folder using git mv

# rename old folder to olds folder
git mv old olds

# rename olds folder to new folder
git mv olds new

# shows the current state of your Git working directory and staging area.
# https://github.com/git-guides/git-status
git status

# adds new or changed files in your working directory to the Git staging area.
# https://github.com/git-guides/git-add
git add .

# creates a commit
# https://github.com/git-guides/git-commit
git commit -m "rename folder from old to new"

# uploads all local branch commits to the corresponding remote branch.
# https://github.com/git-guides/git-push
git push -u origin master

Read Also:

  • Pro Git - GitHub
  • Pro Git Book
  • Git Guides - GitHub
  • git mv
  • git status
  • git add
  • git commit
  • git push
